column2: "Hehehe, you look like a rookie. But don't worry, I'll help you out with some good advice."
"This person seems a lot stronger than you are, Patty."

"Shut up! Strength is less important for an ARKS member than knowledge and information.
You think so too, right?"
"As ARKS members, the main thing we have to watch out for are Darkers!"
"If local creatures get infected, they go totally bonkers! You can't leave them unchecked!"
"The native creatures here aren't too much of a problem, but on other planets..."
"Sorry, my idiot of a sister really doesn't know when to shut up."
"She just spouts out information she hears from other people. Feel free to ignore her."
"But the fact that Darkers are dangerous is an important one to keep in mind."
"Especially now that they've started appearing here more often."
"Okay, Patty, let's go. We need to gather our own information sooner or later."
"Hey, wait! Tea! I'm not done talking!"
"That's fine, no one is listening to you anyway."
